newsitem.title: MACEDONIA: ONLY ONE SHARE TRADES ON MACEDONIA STOCK EXCHANGE.
newsitem.headline: ONLY ONE SHARE TRADES ON MACEDONIA STOCK EXCHANGE.

text.p: Stock turnover and traded volume fell at Tuesday's session of the Macedonian Stock Exchange (MSE), the MSE said.
Total turnover retreated to 1,863 denars from 296,217 denars on September 17 as only one share traded against 159 a week ago.
Only Gradski Targovski Centar traded on the first floor at 1,863 denars, unchanged from last trading and below par of 2,662 denars.

Listed companies trade in two floor sessions. Unlisted ones, mostly firms offered for privatisation, trade in a third floor session. The exchange trades twice a week. ($1=40.36 denars; 1DEM=26.61 denars)
